thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Wandsworth Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Premier Inn London Wandsworth Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David T
title: Excellent
text:
Stayed here for 3 nights while visiting friends and the London galleries etc. We especially asked for a quiet room. The staff were great, very helpful and friendly. The breakfast was good and the room was very clean (spotless), the bed really comfortable. Would definitely book in again on our next visit to London. The bus and train services from here were also great. Many thanks to all the staff.
Room Tip: Ask for a quiet room See more room tips
